message: Let's start with a fair deal. I get the majority, you get a decent chunk. We can work something out if you're unhappy.
I'm not afraid of a fair deal, but I'd like a bit more for my efforts. Your turn to decide.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it closer to 60/40.  I'm not sure how much longer we can keep playing this game, but I'm hoping we can reach an agreement soon.
I'm not convinced that 60/40 is fair. I'll meet you in the middle, but I'm not giving up more than that.
